title: Bobby’s Mailbag: Proposal With Great Grandmother’s Ring + Most Recognizable Songs + Elder Vs. Millennial
itunes:title: Bobby’s Mailbag: Proposal With Great Grandmother’s Ring + Most Recognizable Songs + Elder Vs. Millennial
description:
A listener emailed in about wanting to propose with his great-grandmother’s ring even though he knows it’s not the style his future wife would prefer. We play a game where the show has to identify some of the most recognizable songs ever made. Plus, we get in a round of 'Elder v. Millennial' with Eddie and Morgan2!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
